title: Serene Escape Surrounded by Rice Fields
summary:
Experience a beautiful escape at this modern tropical villa, offering a stunning panoramic rice field view. Enjoy mornings, relax in the outdoor lounge or by the pool, and feel at home when you step into the fully equipped kitchen and stylish living area. At your convenience, a cleaner will be provided during your stay. The accommodation is cleaned 3 times a week and the pool 2 times a week free of charge.

The space
You‚Äôll quickly find that one of the best places to hang out on the property is by the pool or the backyard lounge area. On hot days, it‚Äôs the perfect place to sunbathe or cool down in the pool. The lounge area is great to unwind, put your feet up and read or chill with friends over a bottle or wine.

The modern open-concept kitchen is a wonderful space to prepare a meal or enjoy a morning drink. It‚Äôs spacious and fully equipped with a lovely view of the garden and backyard pool. It also benefits from the tall glass doors in front of the living room area. When they‚Äôre open, it helps circulate cool air around. The dining table is just across from the kitchen; it is perfect for a group of four. 

The decorated living room has comfy sofas where you can relax, take in the view and enjoy the cooling breeze from outside. A smart TV is also available for your entertainment. 

On the second floor you‚Äôll find the designated working station, designed with locally crafted furniture made of teak wood. What better place to focus than up high, overlooking a serene view of rice fields and the pool!

Wake up in a spacious bedroom with floor to ceiling windows that open up to the backyard pool, outside lounge area and the stunning view of rice fields as far as the eye can see. The villa comes with 2 decorated bedrooms all designed in natural soft colours with both having doors leading to the back patio. During the day opening the back doors would help provide natural air flow within the room. The ensuite bathrooms are designed in white and soft pastel blue tiles. We‚Äôll provide you with all the bathroom essentials.

Guest access
The villa is located directly on the rice field and is barrier-free accessible on foot and by scooter/motorbikes. Parking spaces for scooters/motorbikes are available directly in front of the villa. You have to walk about 100m to the main street where free car parking spaces are available. The entire property is intended exclusively for the guest.

Other things to note
Our parking area is perfectly suited for motorbikes, offering a safe and convenient space for them. For car parking, you‚Äôll find ample space available on the main street in front of  Banjar Cepaka or right in front of Villa Kembali approx. 100m away from the villa.

reviews.text: Quietly located in the middle of the rice fields. The lovely villa has a spacious, well-equipped kitchen, dining table and sitting area. The bedrooms with bathrooms are spacious and are to the right and left of the living room. Outside, there is a covered sitting area and there is a pool with 2 sun loungers and 2 chairs. The villa is cleaned 3x week by friendly lady, the garden and swimming pool are maintained. We enjoyed it, despite the quiet location, shops and restaurants are easy accessible by taxi or motorbike. If we visit Bali again, this is definitely our 1st choice!

We needed rest because the pace in France is fast, thanks to this accommodation we were able to have calm, peace and greenery!
There is no music, no club, you must have a scooter if you are 2 or a car if you are with family to get around because on foot, there is nothing.
If you need a change of scenery, it's really the perfect place to rest, it's not hot, the wind blows in the rice fields allowing you to have freshness constantly!
Babies, children and adults can enjoy this beautiful place!
2 large beds, 2 large bathrooms, a quality living room, really it was great ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüèæ

Bj√∂rn and Zelestina really have a gem of a villa here! It's incredibly peaceful, private, and in a local community that makes you feel like you're experiencing Bali when it was untouched and pure. The thoughtful touches in the furniture, the details in the decor, everything felt like it was done with love. I'd highly recommend this place, and now that I know how to find it, I'll definitely be back! If this villa happens to be available, I wouldn't wait much longer to book!

Extremely beautiful place! Views are certainly the most beautiful thing you can find in this area. Questions were always answered and communication went well! Keep in mind that it is a bit of a walk with luggage where the car can't go, but I thought that was worth it. The staff is also very helpful! We have been bothered by electricity outages of a few hours due to heavy rainfall, so I recommend keeping your phone charged just to be sure. Thank you for everything!

We really enjoyed our stay here, we booked over Christmas and it was the perfect place for us to have a quiet & peaceful Christmas. The long path from the main road down to the villa wasn‚Äôt accessible by car, this was a bit frustrating with all our luggage especially because there was so much rain at the time. Other than this I would definitely recommend staying here. Thank you for having us :)

Our stay at the villa went extremely well. The place is beautiful and perfectly maintained, offering all the comforts you need. The view of the rice fields is simply breathtaking. The service was spotless from start to finish, and we felt right at home. We strongly recommend this villa and hope to come back soon.

Absolutely stunning location and villa. The host was amazing to deal with which made travelling to the area for the first time very helpful and comforting. The property is gorgeous, comfortable and very home like, it met our expectations and we were very happy with the choice we  made to stay at Villa Luna.

The house was great. It's really very nice! The pool has a great orientation to the rice fields. When we arrived, there was fresh fruit and 2 coconuts for us. Everything was super clean. Kitchen has really nice plates etc. You can take very nice walks in the rice fields. The communication was great.

While this place was a little further out it is so damn peaceful and beautiful! It was 15-20 minutes scooter to Canguu and the best way to end our holiday so quiet and just felt like old school Bali without the hustle and bustle, the villa is stunning it‚Äôs immaculate and we adored it

We think this was the most beautiful stay in bali so far. If your looking for untouched rice fields, an authentic bali feel without all the traffic this us for you. 
Comfortable beds. Amazing pool, great view right on a stunning walking track perfectly positioned for a sunset

Had the most amazing stay at Villa Luna. Serene and peaceful location and a stunning property both inside and out. The most helpful host and staff. Could not of asked for anything more. Thank you very much! We will 100% be back.
Lokking for a serene place? this is the place to be. Amazing villa, with amazing rice field view. i had a great time during my stay and host were great and very responsive.
Bj√∂rn‚Äôs house was absolutely stunning! The property was modern and spacious and had a beautiful view of the rice fields. We loved having our own pool during the stay!
Our stay was great, however if you plan to go outside in the evening time you should bring flashlight. Not advisable for traveller who has luggage
Beautiful villa in the ricefields. So peaceful!! Only remark is that cleanliness could be improved üôèüèª

Thanks 
Very nice accommodation 
Nice location 
Very pleasant!!
Amazing memories created here. Literally my favorite stay ever.
Thank you Kevin ‚Ä¶ hope to see you again üôè
Beautiful villa, a hidden gem in Bali
Had a lovely time there üíó
